content: the valentine s gnome family set 2 is the third pattern from our crochet gnome-along > free pattern is available on the blog click here 1 for the free pattern- valentine s gnome set 2 > > join us here 2 get the pattern info in your inbox and be among the first ones to be notified when it is published free crochet gnome collection who doesn t love these small cute whimsical creatures after diving into the sea of crochet patterns my amigurumi toys were left a bit behind last year we made a basic doll cal crochet-along as i wanted to create a doll that would be beginner-friendly and everybody could make even non-experienced crocheters this year i am starting a new crochet-along of themed crochet gnomes when i design amigurumi toys i want them to be simple but stunning i will keep this in my gnomes as well we will start with a basic gnome and upgrade to more detailed ones what will you get in this crochet gnome-along at the end of the crochet gnome-along you will have a huge collection of 12-20 crochet gnomes to place around your home give to your friends or maybe sell at craft fairs i said 12-20 gnomes because there will be special bonus gnomes for some of the months i don t think i can have only one christmas gnome do you 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/valentines-day-gnome-family-set-2-free-crochet-gnome-patterns-8/ 2 http //eepurl com/dmmg0t
